titles.title: Nuclear Used Fuel Prize Act of 2008
Nuclear Used Fuel Prize Act of 2008
To authorize the Secretary of Energy to establish monetary prizes for achievements in designing and proposing nuclear energy used fuel alternatives.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science and Technology.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Environment.

bill.summary:
Nuclear Used Fuel Prize Act of 2008 - Instructs the Secretary of Energy to implement a program to award cash prizes competitively for research, development, demonstration, and commercial application of nuclear used fuel storage.
Authorizes the Secretary to enter into an agreement with a private, nonprofit entity to administer the prize competition.
